original_text: It will be the same for people who tell lies in court. They deceive the judge at the city gate. They say false things against good people to make them guilty. People who are like that will have gone! It will be the same for people who tell lies in court. They deceive the judge at the city gate. They say false things against good people to make them guilty. People who are like that will have gone!
korean_text: 그들은 송사로 사람에게 죄를 씌우며 성문에서 판단하는 자를 올무로 잡듯 하며 헛된 일로 의인을 억울하게 하느니라

sentences.original_text: It will be the same for people who tell lies in court
sentences.korean_translation: 법정에서 거짓말하는 사람들에게도 똑같이 될 것이다

sentences.original_text: They deceive the judge at the city gate
They say false things against good people

sentences.korean_translation: 그들이 죄가 있는 것처럼 만들기 위해

sentences.original_text: People who are like that will have gone
It will be the same for people who tell lies in court

sentences.original_text: People who are like that will have gone!
